segments.text: Well , Jeff , that was a very productive meeting , I thought . You had some really great ideas in there !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Well , thanks for saying so .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I mean it . Look , are you hungry ? Shall we go get something to eat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , well , let me just get my coat and we'll go to the diner around the corner .
segments.speaker: S1
